text: Guangzhou Xiaopeng Motors Technology Co., Ltd., trading as XPeng Motors (), commonly known as XPeng, is a Chinese automobile manufacturer headquartered in Guangzhou, with offices in Mountain View, California in the US. The electric car company launched in 2014 by former UC Browser founder He Xiaopeng. == References == == Other websites == * XPeng website * XPeng America (XMotors) * ['how to say XPeng'] Learn How To Pronounce XPeng. title: XPeng
